info.name: BrickOS 98 Theme for Brick-Hill
info.description:
Go back to the past with this Windows 98 theme!

Default Settings:
Theme Color: #000097
Background Color: #008080
info.additionalInfo:
15/09/2021 - Theme Revamp Released. The theme is now a lot more consistent and in-line with the original Windows 98 OS. There's a few features missing for now, but they'll all be added soonTM, and if you don't like the remake you can always go back to the legacy version by manually downloading the theme .css file below. 




==BrickOS 98 LEGACY Theme Changelogs==
Manual Download: https://pastebin.com/EYHjMAUq

24/01/2021 - Small bug fixes.

07/04/2020 - Small bug fixes. This will be probably the last update for this theme.

??/??/2020 - You can now change the Color Theme and Background Color

28/01/2020 - Theme is released!
